definitions.definition: The act of ascending; a motion upwards.
definitions.example: He made a tedious ascent of Mont Blanc.

definitions.definition: The way or means by which one ascends.
definitions.example: There is a difficult northern ascent from Malaucene of Mont Ventoux.

definitions.definition: An eminence, hill, or high place.
The degree of elevation of an object, or the angle it makes with a horizontal line; inclination; rising grade.
definitions.example: The road has an ascent of 5 degrees.

definitions.definition: The ascender height in a typeface.
An increase, for example in popularity or hierarchy
